milestones.title: Graduated from Cavite State University

milestones.title: Finished internship at iCargo Pacific
milestones.description: Successfully completed my internship as a backend development intern at iCargo Pacific, where I coded with Laravel, Postgre, Vue, and Firebase.

milestones.title: Started Internship at iCargo Pacific

milestones.title: Finished Undergraduate Thesis
milestones.description: Successfully defended our thesis and completed a mobile application with native Android development, as part of a team project with my partner.

milestones.title: Programmer Role for Senior High School Research
